fun.connor.lighter.compiler.generator.codegen

Interface Expression

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Statement, TypedElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalVariable, MethodParameterGenerator, OptionalGenerator, RequestGenerator, SimpleField, TypeAdaptorGenerator

    public interface Expression
extends TypedElement, Statement
    A Java source element that represents a value. This could be a literal, a method call, or a variable. Expressions are also Statements as some expressions have side-effects.

    • Method Summary
